1.content:
Characters

Ellen is a 18 year old lives with her house mates in a 4 bed room house,they are growing tired of the slob like ways and her lack of person hygiene, the final straw comes when are maggots are found in a left over pizza box.Sharon, Rebecca and Emily will help her come to understand her true purpose in life.

Rosanne is a 21 year old,who lives with her mother. She has always had unusual desire to be become apart of the garbage from a young age. Finally after returning home from her her 21st birthday night out, drunk she gives in to her forbidden fantasy,tipping over the kitchen bin and rolling around in the contents, she felt so liberated and enthralled she didn't realise the commotion woke up her mother who silently looked on her daughter act out her darkest desires. What will the morning bring?

Rob has always treated women badly,but tonight he picked the wrong lady to cross, Jenny will destroy his ego, he will experience humiliation beyond a level that he can comprehend.

Paula is a 40 year old divorcee with No children , who lives in multi-story building, through accidental lose of footing, finds out that the stink and mess of garbage isn't a such a bad place after all, where will her adventure lead her.

Sharon, Rebecca and Emily were disgusted when they found the pizza box, but the last straw came when they found Ellen draped over the top of their garbage wheelie bin. She had come home late, opened the bin and tossed her cookies before passing ou draped head down in the almost empty bin. The three realized she had no panties and h her breasts ad partially fallen out of her bra and blouse.
Emily commented, "OMG, she's not only filthy, she's a drunken slut too." Sharon asked, "Do we have to have her as a roommate?" But it was Rebecca who said, "No, we just need to get rid of her somehow."

121.content:
She awoke with a stir on her pillow, unaware of what happened last night.

That was until the photo came into focus, of her rummaging through garbage naked like happy as a pig in mud, to add to her horror there was a note next to the photo,it read

" We need to talk honey, love mom x"

Roseann was Mortified, the colour drained from her face and butterflies flew in to her already unsettled stomach,

It felt like the void had just swallowed her whole and part of her at that moment ,wised a hole would just consume her rather than her having to explain her last night to mom.

There was no escaping it though she knew would have to face her mother about this, She had no idea how Lynn her mother would be.

Rosanne thought there's nothing for it, she would get her dressing gown and slippers on and go and face her mother, she headed down stairs to find,,,

1211.content:
Lynn her mother greeted her as she came down in to the kitchen, "good morning rosey" that was her pet name that only her mother called her,

"good morning, mom she said trying her best not to sound terrified of what might happen next. " Are you hungry? I made you some pan cakes, she was but not sure if there would be room in her stomach for all the butterflies flying around in there.

"Yep ,thank you mom" trying to sound chirpy and normal. After finishing the pan cakes off she had a cup of tea.

"Now lets talk about what happened last night" Roseann almost blew her last mouthful of tea out, erm that?

"Yes my dear daughter that"

sheepishly, she nodded in agreement,

" I will start the confessions, I have known for about 5 years about your interest in garbage, from when we shared a PC the histories
revealed a repeat viewing of land fill and garbage bin images,at first I thought it was an interest from an environmental point of view
but then I found the deleted photo pictures in recycle bin off that you had made of your self photo shopped in to the rubbish heaps Naked no less"

Roseann heart sank and almost went white,

but her mother continued " I thought they was totally faked and been sent from a bully or something picking on you, but then the file origin tag revealed they was from ""My Documents"" so I knew you had not received them from another source, I didn't bring it up with you at the time because though i was shocked you was creating naked images of your self, i didn't want to spook you into been ashamed of your self."

They hugged and roseann didn't want to let go, or talk but her mother gently broke the hug and looked into her eyes, "Now I want to to open up fully to me about this,last night showed me that it wasn't a fade and that it is some thing important to you"

Roseann,now teary nodded,

Choking back the tears, she started " It began from about seven,I accidentally fell in to an open rubbish bag at a party, Steph's mom told you had fell on my piece of cake, it wasn't the case i had fallen into the food waste bag and started to play with the contents out of innocent fun and it felt amazing and wonderful all the messy textures,

when I was discovered it Steph's mom looked on in horror but stayed calm and said to be me "" look at you all messy there, you don't want to be playing in there come and play with other children,

I shook my head looking I defiance saying No me is happy in mess I am trash girl, throwing more some used plates out of the bag,
Oh no dear you don't want to be in there, we throw garbage away not little girls silly, But i am gar-big, Throw me away!

"To which she pulled me out of the bag and laughed at me, and said "" come on you silly princess"", and she got me cleaned up and
and back in the party games, she gave me a bigger bag of sweets and said told tell your mother about your trash adventures ok ?

I nodded and smiled, but some part of me was forever changed, the thought of been in the garbage forever stayed with me and grew like a tree wanting to burst through the pavement of my normality"

Lynn looked on intrigue, " go on continue"

"So as I got older it grew more in to a fetish, i would look at the bags of rubbish at school with longing eyes,wanting to dive in to the food waste, and rub it in to me making me in to garbage. When I learned how to masturbate, I would play with my self while breathing in the smells of waste food in plastic bag, repeating to my self " I am garbage ,garbage fills the hole in my heart""

Lynn had a look on her face amazement and at parts oh that make sense of that now moments.

Roseann bit her lip looked that the table and went for it,.., MOM I want to become garbage, feeling so free in admitting that out loud ,I want to be treated rubbish and surrounded by it, making me live of the old scraps of food and drink from half finished water bottles"
saying it all with her eyes closed and face scrunched up ,like she was expecting to be slapped or some thing.

At first her mother was taken about by the directness of her daughters confession with such passion,

but she thought for a minute or two, then Replied " Are you sure I mean you was very mess last night and the smell was quite ripe,,"

Roseann cut her off, " yes with all my fuckup soul, now teary and full of conviction, I want to be your garbage daughter to become your garbage".! now looking with almost pleading eyes,

Lynn took a moment to process her daughters request,

then she said,..

12112.content:
"Ok I'll do it,but there are conditions; if your as committed as you say you are to becoming garbage then you should be fine about accepting them,.

"Alright then, what are your conditions she said in a neutral tone, not sure of what to expect next,part excited part nervous.

"They are the following:-

"you have to commit completely ,by hand writing a letter explaining you have a decided to take off with a friend and to not return. That you wish me to dispose of all that is left behind.

Roseann was mental torn, she loved her belonging, but after thinking about it,she realized it made perfect sense to be set free from her earthly belonging to shed the worry and burden of belongings,so she could follow her heart. Before she could say yes out of instinct her mother continued.

" That you understand and fully accept that once you become garbage, you will no longer be my daughter, you will be my rubbish,discarded property of Me,.

" you will be ignored and not spoken to as I don't make habit of talking to garbage in a bin.

" you will not be let out of the bin to go to the toilet,so you will do all your business in the sack you sit,.

" you will forage and consume the food that I throw into your sack and drink what ever is available in your bag,.

Roseann was taken back by this because she had never thought about that, but it again some how in her soul felt it made sense
why would garbage mind been in filth ?

" Finally you must accept your fate is a one way transmutation from Female human to filth covered garbage and that your path will lead you to the final resting place of most garbage, you will be dumped in a big metal bin and collected compacted and dumped into a land fill site."

"if you survive the transnational journey you will truly become living garbage,"

" If you accept these conditions, then write the letter I request and sign it and also pack a bag as you would if you was travelling light and leave both letter and bag on kitchen table, stay in your room and await me to take you to your fated path,

1213.content:
Her mother was sitting there drinking coffee, and her Nan was there as well drinking a cup of tea, "good morning dear",
you reply "morning nan" with a look of sheepish surprise on your face.

"Take a seat Rosanne, her mother suggested and she sat down her mother slid a semi warm cup of coffee to her,

Drinking eagerly, Rosanne listened nervously as her Nan started to talk, " Your mother has informed me about what happened last night, and all the cleaning up she had do after she finished cleaning you,. Rosanne couldn't her Nan or mother in the eyes just staring at table in front of her, she had turned beetroot read with embarrassment.

Rosanne went to say " i'm so.. sorry i can explain,,, but was cut off by her mother, "let me explain why your Nan is here, I called her because, I needed advice about what to do with you and last night's eventful discovery. I can't let it just slide because something obviously needs to be addressed.

"Do you have self worth issues? Do get treated like rubbish by any one? Have I been a bad mother to the point you don't feel loved ?!!

Nan Helen jumped in to the conversation, clearly her daughter was feeling a bit emotional about this all, "what your mother is trying to say is what is the reason you willing trashed the bin and rolled in its contents?,

Rosanne emotional her self but feeling beyond the point of no return, said with almost an excited nervousness, " I want to become a garbage pet and live in the bin with the other rubbish!

Rosanne almost expecting laughter or disgust from both of them was surprised when Helen said pretty calmly asked "what is a garbage pet ?

her mother equally baffled but not saying any thing,

"Well a garbage pet is some that is treated as garbage, but not thrown away with it into the truck instead they get out the bag and either stay dirty or are cleaned by there owner, and then get back into a rubbish bag ready to receive the new garbage to come forth, they live of what is thrown away and can be made do there toilet habits in their bag or be taken out of there bag and walked like a dog to do their toilet bits out side.

"so a garbage pet is a lot like a pet dog but lives in the bin instead ? " Yes Nan and they wear a collar with there owner's detains on the tag just encase they get thrown away and some even get chipped to keep track of them, so they can be returned to their owner.

"so you want to be treated in this manner, and become property of an owner, Yes Nan Rosanne now sure of her self.

Hmm, rosa, you wait here me and your mother need to talk in private for a moment, Rosanne's heart went triple beat, what would they make of her strange ambition.

they went out side both women in relative apprehension about what they had just heard,

Silent was the house, while Rosanne a waited the out come.
an hour after they when out, Rosanne awoke from her nap on the table, to find them just returning,

Mom looking restful but a little concerned but Nan looking calm but assured,

" We have talked over what to do with you weather you need counselling or weather indulging your wishful fantasy would be therapy in it's self as you show no signs of uncertainty.

Your mother agreed with me that it would be better that some one that will look after you becomes your owner, rather than a stranger with no emotional attachment taking you on. So here are your option's and only these options exist for you now. they are ,,,,

122.content:
She was woke up by sound of the next doors dog barking,

" woe, that was a weird,,dream, fuck! it wasn't a dream,it wasn't a dream! She screamed to her self,

"Calm down" she told her self, blowing steady breaths, picking the banana skins from her hair,
"Wow I must of been out of it last night to get this mess,

"What the hell was I thinking ,Mom is... Fuck! Mom,oh NO,oh no",frantically she searched for any sign of her mother been through here, quickly scouting for mom car keys they was still there! She must of left by the front door,

"FEW!" Mom must of gone out for her early morning walk, she would be gone for some time.

Rosanne's brain started to hatch a dashing escape plan for her situation, she spoke aloud,"If clean this mess up she will never know what I did". She quickly got up off the floor almost sliding back on the ass on some cold porridge.

once up she quickly brushed her self off, pealing off the plastic wrappers that clung to her breasts like roosting bats, her hair was part mated by cold gravy, rotten tomatoes squished between her toes ,Roseann felt at the moment the she belonged in the garbage but knew she didn't want her mother finding out about this.

She got the remaining garbage of her self and then set to the task of getting it all back in the bin. Once that was achieved she set about cleaning her self off, in the shower ,not missing the opportunity to get off on the feelings of what she did, repeating to her self as she came hard "I am a garbage girl!, I Belong in the bin with the other garbage"

Once cleaned up dried her self off and got dressed, She thought it was all over and that no one knew, but she was wrong,,,

13.content:
It was Friday night at Big Ben's Bar, it was a British themed bar in America, Rob liked it because he met a lot of exotic women there, and of course beer was in no short supply.

Rob was what you call beyond drunk and at this point he was only thinking with his penis. He was looking around the bar when he spotted a very gorgeous slightly older lady, he decided he was gonna get some action tonight so he stumbled on up to her.

"Hey gorgeous hows about you and me head to my place?"

Rob was so drunk he didn't even notice he spilled some of his beer.

"My names not gorgeous its Jenny, and you spilled your beer on me."

"Oh sorry babe, or err Jenny, I know just the place where you can clean it up, mine."

Jenny was getting angry, she did not wont to deal with this slob so she didn't, she had the power to fix it so she did.

"Do you always treat women like trash? maybe you should know what its like to be treated like trash.

Rob was confused, Jenny had started to speak some kinda gibberish, then there was a slight breeze and he felt a cold chill run down his spine.

"There from now on all women will treat you like trash." Jenny then crumpled up her bar receipt and threw it at Rob.

Rob just sat there as Jenny got up and left, he didn't know what to think, what was that, she said something weird then he felt different somehow.

After a while Rob got up and left, he had to walk home for obvious reasons. On the way home he saw a lady she had a disposable cup and other bits of trash she didn't wont to carry it anymore but there was no trash in site. As soon as Rob pasted her she grabbed the caller of his t shirt and dumped her trash down it.
13.title: Rob

14.content:
It started off as a normal night though slightly rushed,

Paula was carrying her garbage to the building garbage skip ,she wasn't dressed to the task though,she was in her night wear of pink night gown, with her dressing gown over that, and her just popping out wore out shoes on her feet they have very little grip on the floor and was slightly falling a part.

She had left her door ajar but it had not stayed that way, she heard it slam as she turned in to the stair well of her hall with her bag's "Bugger" she muttered to her self,she kept a secret key by her door just encase of such moments, She was due to go on holiday the following day for 2 weeks, it was a dream trip, and so she had cleaned out the fridge and done all her cleaning tasks the flat was
spotless to the point it looked devoid of life. She had no pets, just her plants.which was in bath with enough water to last.

The garbage skip or "the pit "as it was known was housed in an outer part of her building where she lived, the bin it self was a commercial role on skip it was about 2 meters deep and 10 meters long rectangle and the trucks came to collect it every 2 weeks from the shed it was housed in,

The raised bit you fling your rubbish in from was above it for safety there was a rail but the was removable so that if you had any big items you could just wheel them in and push them over the edge straight into the garbage pit as it was dubbed by residents.

Some reason the rail was removed from its holding and the gap way open, before she put her rubbish in she peered over the brink to she what big item had gone it ,it was dark and and it smelt but she could make out mattress in the gloom of the barley ample light installed above the platform.

She didn't much attention to the pooled liquid around one her bags, a tub of old yogurt had erupted and split its contents via torn hole in the bag on to floor just in front of the edge of the platform.she picked up the first bag and threw it in, with gusto.

the other bag,she pondered for a moment and then gave a mighty left boot hitting on the side of the with the hole it make it spew out the remains of the Yogurt, onto her foot. the bag went flying,she quietly screamed "goal!" to her self, and in that moment when she went to take a step back she felt a lack of traction on her left foot then her right foot creaked in to the split yogurt, and it was all over for Paula's footing, she was slipping and the action of her right foot slipping sent her forward past the point of balance and she went over the edge arms flaying in mid air it felt like time slowed down and every thing was in slow motion, she arched in mid air trying to the last to reach the side of the wide gap but in doing so court the back of her head on the edge, rending her out cold.

her limp body fell landing face up on the dumped mattress,

In the late morning she awoke to find,
14.title: Paula

142.content:
She didn't register at first the dragging sounds above her, but huff and whooshing sound soon got her attention along with the approaching shadowed mass heading straight for her ,Frozen with shock,fear and confusion, she court it full on, an open bag of garbage landed square over her head and upper body, unleashing there pungent contents all over her upper body, her screams of panic and terror muffled by the bag it's self, ripping into the bag with free hands, send the contents of the bag flying down her body,

Now covered in garbage she wept and wimped in the gloom of pit soul crushed and awash with despair,

it was an assault on every sense, her hair was caked up with stale porridge, with bits crush of burnt toast sticking out like branches of a tree, her face, now free of porridge, beans from half used tin drizzled down her night ware, with a clump of Chinese noodled with veg,

her lower part stained with the remains of a beef casserole, that had congealed with contents of veg and meat.

With all this food her stomach started to get hungry remembering she hadn't eaten the previous night, her thoughts polarized, She knew she would have to eat at some point but ,the thought of eating some ones garbage was unthinkable, but then cramping of hunger started to hit her.

What does she do...

1421.content:
Paula couldn't hold out any more,she reached down into and picked up a handful of noodles. Closing her eyes in shame of what she was about to do. She reluctantly brought the noodles up to her mouth and put some took a bite out of them fearing the worst about the taste she tentatively started to chew and swallow.

It wasn't as bad as she thought it would be,they was a bit rubbery but chew-able, tabooed excitement of the moment took her by surprise, she didn't think she would get any sought of rush from eating garbage food,but like the first time since her friend Lisa kissed her when she was young. She felt a rush and very much alive.

The feeling fascinated her spoke aloud to her self " it's not like chose to be in a giant Dumpster with the garbage", but like the been kissed by her friend,she didn't choose that either but it felt so naughty and exciting!

As interesting as was to her still needed to locate water or some drinkable liquid for her to take in,she was still feeling reluctant about what she was about to do but knew there must be some thing in the other bags that was in the pit with her, she stood up and brushed her self down the garbage smell was now unavoidable it was all over her clothing now, a once neon pink dressing gown was now a dirty muted pink and totally brown in parts. Her night gown was now matching the surrounding garbage, soaked through in garbage juice,

That term made her giggle, like it was some sort of shake or some thing, Like the rambling's of some losing the plot perhaps she was slowing going mad after all she did bag her head.

strangely she wasn't feel all that different from the garbage around her maybe it was started to seep in to her brain, " now you do sound crazy,but hey no one was there to listen.

Paula started digging through the bags for some thing to drink, after a while managed to find some half drunk cans, and the blessing all finds a 2 litter water bottle.

As she drank she looked around the gloom of the pit,she wasn't keen to be found in this state,but she realized that people don't look in a bin when they throw things away, she was in the world of the lost and discarded and she was been ignored just like the rest of the garbage bags.

Some thing about this brought a sense of liberation,maybe been garbage wasn't so bad, she planted her self down in some bags and plucked up some bags up for her bed, to sleep, it had been tiring day,but it was getting cold in here, she sighed and pulled three big bags over on to her self, they was fairy dry.

What would tomorrow bring her?
1421.title: Give in and eat from the garbage food?
